title: Today’s F1 starting grid for the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix after Stroll pulls out
summary: Oscar Piastri will start on pole for the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix after a devastatingly fast qualifying lap. Here's how the starting grid — with only 19 drivers — looks for Sunday's race in Barcelona

qa_pairs.question: Who secured pole position for the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix?
What was the total number of drivers participating in the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix?
What is the significance of Oscar Piastri's qualifying performance?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He achieved the fastest lap to start from pole position.
wrong_options: He had the slowest lap time.
